name: _otps
schema: CREATE TABLE `_otps` (`collectionRef` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `created` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `password` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `recordRef` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `sentTo` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `updated` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
